title: Moonbeam's Ocean Friend
description: A gentle moonbeam discovers friendship with sea waves in a futuristic underwater world.
text: [GENTLE] Moonbeam shines down, down, down. [CALM] Into future ocean deep. Glowing fish swim by, by, by. [JOYFUL] Wave says 'Hello friend!' [chuckle] Moonbeam giggles soft and bright. [WHISPERING] 'Sleep now, ocean friend.' [SLEEPY] Together they rest, rest, rest.
annotated_text: [GENTLE] Moonbeam shines down, down, down. [CALM] Into future ocean deep. Glowing fish swim by, by, by. [JOYFUL] Wave says 'Hello friend!' [chuckle] Moonbeam giggles soft and bright. [WHISPERING] 'Sleep now, ocean friend.' [SLEEPY] Together they rest, rest, rest.
morals: Friendship brings comfort
Peaceful rest is shared joy

title: Bella's Soft Petal Bed
description: A gentle butterfly finds the perfect flower to rest in as night falls over the magical garden.
text: [GENTLE] Bella butterfly flies, flies, flies. [CALM] Pretty flowers dance, dance, dance. [CURIOUS] Which flower bed? Which flower bed? [JOYFUL] Soft rose petals, warm and red. [WHISPERING] Hush, hush, little wings. [GENTLE] Moonbeams sing sweet lullabies. [SLEEPY] Close tiny eyes, sleep tight. Sweet dreams in flower light.
annotated_text: [GENTLE] Bella butterfly flies, flies, flies. [CALM] Pretty flowers dance, dance, dance. [CURIOUS] Which flower bed? Which flower bed? [JOYFUL] Soft rose petals, warm and red. [WHISPERING] Hush, hush, little wings. [GENTLE] Moonbeams sing sweet lullabies. [SLEEPY] Close tiny eyes, sleep tight. Sweet dreams in flower light.
morals: Finding comfort in nature
Rest is important

title: Arjun's Flying Robot Friend
description: A brave little boy in futuristic India discovers a magical robot friend who teaches him about play and friendship through floating adventures.
text:
[RHYTHMIC] Little Arjun found a robot friend,
Shiny blue with lights that bend.

[PAUSE]

[GENTLE] Robot says, "Let's float and play!"
Up they go, hooray, hooray!

[PAUSE]

[JOYFUL] Through the sky above Mumbai,
Friends together, flying high.

[PAUSE]

[WHISPERING] Robot whispers, "Time to rest,
Friendship is the very best."

[SLEEPY] Down they float to bed so deep,
Arjun smiles and falls asleep.

[PAUSE]

[SLEEPY] Down they float to bed so deep,
Arjun smiles and falls asleep.
morals: Friendship brings joy and adventure
Playing together creates special bonds

title: Pepper's Garden Light
description: A gentle ladybug named Pepper helps her vegetable garden family by finding the perfect nighttime glow. A soothing poem about problem-solving and caring for home.
text:
[RHYTHMIC] Little Pepper, red and round,
In the garden, safe and sound.

[PAUSE]

[GENTLE] Carrots sleepy, peas so tired,
All the veggies feeling wired.

[PAUSE]

[CALM] Pepper thinks, "What can I do?
Make them cozy, through and through."

[PAUSE]

[JOYFUL] Found a firefly's gentle gleam,
Soft and warm, a golden dream.

[PAUSE]

[WHISPERING] Now the garden glows so bright,
Everyone says, "Good night, good night."

[PAUSE]

[SLEEPY] Pepper curls upon a leaf,
Garden home brings sweet relief.

[PAUSE]

[SLEEPY] Pepper curls upon a leaf,
Garden home brings sweet relief.
morals: Helping others makes everyone feel better
Home is where we care for each other

title: The Forest's Digital Symphony
description: A young fox and her woodland friends discover an ancient grove where nature and technology harmonize, teaching them that modern passions can coexist beautifully with the natural world.
text:
[RHYTHMIC] In the heart of the Pacific Northwest,
Where cedars touch the clouded sky,
Live creatures with a modern quest—
To blend old wisdom with WiFi.

[PAUSE]

[GENTLE] Luna the fox codes by moonlight,
While Sage the owl debugs her dreams,
And River the raccoon streams midnight
Nature documentaries by streams.

[PAUSE]

[JOYFUL] Together they seek the Digital Grove,
Where legend says the ancients planned
A place where circuits learn to love
The rhythm of the living land.

[PAUSE]

[CALM] Through fern-filled paths and mossy stones,
They follow signals in the breeze,
Until they find where nature owns
The harmony of code and trees.

[PAUSE]

[WHISPERING] Here algorithms dance with rain,
And servers hum like cricket songs,
Proof that progress need not stain
The world where every heart belongs.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [SLEEPY] So rest now, knowing dreams can weave
Technology with nature's art,
And every passion we believe
Can honor both the mind and heart.

And every passion we believe
Can honor both the mind and heart.
morals: Technology and nature can coexist harmoniously when approached with wisdom and respect
Following your passions while staying connected to the natural world creates the most fulfilling journey

title: Amara and the Star-Song Celebration
description: A young prehistoric astronomer in ancient Africa discovers her unique gift for reading celestial patterns and leads her tribe in a celebration of the cosmos.
text:
[RHYTHMIC] In the cradle of humanity's dawn,
Where acacia trees stretched toward the sky,
Lived Amara, whose eyes were drawn
To the ancient stars wheeling by.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [GENTLE] Her grandmother spoke of stellar lore,
How constellations told the seasons' tale,
But Amara saw patterns no one saw before—
Celestial rhythms that never fail.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [CALM] She traced the paths of wandering lights,
Those planets dancing their orbital song,
Calculating distances through countless nights,
Wondering where in this dance she belonged.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [JOYFUL] The elders gathered when she shared her sight,
How Venus rises before the dawn,
How Jupiter's moons eclipse its light,
How stellar wisdom can guide us on.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] "You are the keeper of cosmic truth,"
Her grandmother smiled with ancient grace,
"Your gift connects our people's youth
To the infinite wisdom of time and space."

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [JOYFUL] The tribe prepared a celebration grand,
With drums that echoed the pulsar's beat,
And Amara, with her steady hand,
Made star-maps where science and spirit meet.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [WHISPERING] As firelight danced beneath the dome
Of countless suns in velvet night,
Amara knew she'd found her home—
A bridge between earth's warmth and stellar light.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [SLEEPY] Now when you gaze at stars above,
Remember Amara's gift so true:
That science blooms from wonder's love,
And the cosmos celebrates in you.

title: Nayeli's Arctic School Discovery
description: A brave Inuit girl discovers a magical ice school where polar animals gather to learn together in the snowy wilderness.
text:
[RHYTHMIC] Long ago in the Arctic white,
Lived Nayeli, brave and bright.
With her sealskin boots so warm,
She walked through each snowy storm.

[PAUSE]

[GENTLE] One day while hunting for her meal,
She found tracks that looked so real.
Polar bear paws in the snow,
Where could they possibly go?

[PAUSE]

[CALM] Following prints both big and small,
She climbed up an icy wall.
There behind the frozen peak,
She found what she came to seek.

[PAUSE]

[JOYFUL] A school made of crystal ice,
Where animals learned so nice!
Bear cubs counting fish to eat,
Seals learning to swim so neat.

[PAUSE]

[WHISPERING] Arctic foxes shared their food,
While walruses played and wooed.
Nayeli watched with wonder deep,
As creatures learned before they sleep.

[PAUSE]

[SLEEPY] Now when stars begin to glow,
She dreams of that school of snow.
Where all creatures, big and small,
Learn together, one and all.

Learn together, one and all.
morals: Learning brings all creatures together
Curiosity leads to wonderful discoveries

title: Arjun's Magic Peacock Feather
description: A young boy in ancient India discovers a magical peacock feather that transforms his world through play and wonder.
text:
[RHYTHMIC][GENTLE] Little Arjun found a feather bright,
Blue and green with golden light.
From Mayura, the peacock king,
A gift that made his heart sing.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC][JOYFUL] When he waved it in the air,
Flowers bloomed everywhere!
Rainbow colors filled the sky,
As magical birds came floating by.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC][CALM][WHISPERING] Through his play, the world grew new,
Filled with wonder, green and blue.
Arjun learned with joy so deep,
Magic lives in hearts that leap.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC][SLEEPY] Now he dreams of feathers bright,
Dancing softly through the night.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC][CALM][WHISPERING] Through his play, the world grew new,
Filled with wonder, green and blue.
Arjun learned with joy so deep,
Magic lives in hearts that leap.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC][SLEEPY] Now he dreams of feathers bright,
Dancing softly through the night.
morals: Wonder and imagination make the world magical
Playing with curiosity leads to beautiful discoveries

title: Nayak and the Forgotten Ice Garden
description: A young Inuit boy discovers a magical ice garden beneath his family's igloo, learning that nature's most precious treasures are often hidden in plain sight.
text:
[RHYTHMIC] Deep in the Arctic, where snowflakes dance,
Lived young Nayak in his family's stance,
An igloo warm with seal oil light,
That glowed like stars throughout the night.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [GENTLE] One morning while his parents slept,
Nayak found a crack that wept,
With crystal drops of purest blue,
That sparkled with a magic hue.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [CALM] He followed down the icy trail,
Through passages both narrow and frail,
Until he found a garden bright,
With frozen flowers, pure delight.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [JOYFUL] Ice tulips bloomed in silver rows,
And crystal trees where arctic wind blows,
This secret world beneath their home,
Where winter's children freely roam.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [WHISPERING] He climbed back up with wonder true,
To share this gift of arctic blue,
For nature keeps her treasures near,
In places that we hold most dear.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [SLEEPY] Now Nayak dreams of gardens white,
Beneath his family's loving light,
Where magic sleeps in ice and snow,
And peaceful winter breezes blow.

And peaceful winter breezes blow.
morals: Nature holds wonderful surprises in unexpected places
Home is where we discover life's greatest treasures

title: Mei and the Moonlit Origami Festival
description: A young girl and her forest friends work together to create magical origami creatures for the annual Moonlit Festival, learning that their different talents make the celebration truly special.
text:
[RHYTHMIC] In the bamboo forest where the moon shines bright,
Lived brave little Mei with paper folding might.
She loved making cranes that could dance and fly,
But the festival needed more beneath the sky.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [GENTLE] Her friend Hana painted with colors so true,
While Kenji carved dragons from bamboo.
Taro sang melodies sweet and clear,
But Mei felt worried the day drawing near.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [CALM] "My origami won't be enough alone,"
She sighed as she sat by the wishing stone.
But Hana heard her and had a bright thought,
"Together we'll make what cannot be bought!"

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [JOYFUL] They painted Mei's cranes in sunset hues,
Kenji carved holders in morning blues.
Taro's songs made the paper dance,
Giving each creature a magical chance.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [WHISPERING] When festival night came with silver light,
Their origami glowed warm and bright.
The village gasped at the wondrous sight,
Friends working together made everything right.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [SLEEPY] Now Mei dreams of paper birds that soar,
With friends beside her, she could ask for no more.
In moonbeams soft, her origami rest,
Knowing together, they always do their best.

In moonbeams soft, her origami rest,
Knowing together, they always do their best.
morals: Working together makes us stronger than working alone
Everyone has unique talents that make the group special

title: Coral's Journey Through the Healing Tides
description: A young ocean spirit discovers how the microscopic world of plankton creates life-giving oxygen, transforming her understanding of the sea's healing powers.
text:
[RHYTHMIC] In ancient waters, deep and blue,
Lived Coral, spirit brave and true.
She swam through currents, swift and free,
Guardian of the healing sea.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [GENTLE] But something strange began to show—
The waters dimmed, their healing glow
Grew weak and pale. The fish felt ill,
The coral reefs grew cold and still.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [JOYFUL] Then Coral dove to depths unknown,
Where tiny plankton called their home.
She watched them dance, so small, so bright,
Creating oxygen and light.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [CALM] "We are the healers!" they sang sweet,
"Through photosynthesis complete!
We breathe in sunlight, breathe out air,
For every creature, everywhere."

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [WHISPERING] Now Coral understood at last—
The healing wisdom of the past.
The smallest life creates the whole,
The ocean's breath, the ocean's soul.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [SLEEPY] She guards the plankton, night and day,
Keeping pollution far away.
For in their microscopic dance,
Lies healing's greatest, sweetest chance.

morals: The smallest actions can have the greatest impact on healing and wellness
Understanding science helps us protect and nurture the natural world

title: Diego and the Star Map of the Ancient Temple
description: A young Mayan boy discovers a celestial map in an ancient temple that reveals the connection between earthly friendships and the vast cosmos above.
text:
[RHYTHMIC] In the jungle green where temples rise,
Lived Diego with his curious eyes,
He loved to climb the pyramid stone,
But often felt he walked alone.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [GENTLE] One starlit night he found a door,
Hidden deep in temple floor,
Inside, the walls began to glow,
With constellations high and low.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [JOYFUL] The ancient map showed Venus bright,
And Jupiter's majestic light,
Each planet danced in painted gold,
With stories that the Maya told.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [CALM] As Diego traced each starry line,
He saw how all the stars align,
Like friends who come from far and near,
To make the night sky bright and clear.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [WHISPERING] He learned that just like stars above,
We're connected through our love,
Each friendship is a shining light,
That guides us through the darkest night.

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [SLEEPY] Now Diego knows he's not alone,
The stars and friends have always shown,
That in this cosmic, vast embrace,
We each have found our special place.

We each have found our special place.
morals: True friendship connects us like stars in the night sky
We are all part of something greater than ourselves

title: Nanha Sitara Aur Uski Neend Ki Lori
description: Ek chhota sitara jungle mein sabko neend dilata hai apni komal roshni se.
text: [GENTLE] Nanha sitara chamka. [CALM] Shh shh, neend aa rahi. [SLEEPY] Jungle sota, sitara jagta. [GENTLE] Komal roshni, komal roshni. [CALM] Patte hilte, hawa chalti. [SLEEPY] Shh shh, neend aa gayi. [GENTLE] Sitara muskaya, sab so gaye.
annotated_text: [GENTLE] Nanha sitara chamka. [CALM] Shh shh, neend aa rahi. [SLEEPY] Jungle sota, sitara jagta. [GENTLE] Komal roshni, komal roshni. [CALM] Patte hilte, hawa chalti. [SLEEPY] Shh shh, neend aa gayi. [GENTLE] Sitara muskaya, sab so gaye.
morals: Doosron ki madad karna achhi baat hai
Prakriti humara khayal rakhti hai
annotated_text_devanagari: [GENTLE] नन्हा सितारा चमका। [CALM] शश शश, नींद आ रही। [SLEEPY] जंगल सोता, सितारा जगता। [GENTLE] कोमल रोशनी, कोमल रोशनी। [CALM] पत्ते हिलते, हवा चलती। [SLEEPY] शश शश, नींद आ गई। [GENTLE] सितारा मुस्काया, सब सो गए।

title: Nano Khargosh Aur Samudri Dost
description: Ek chhota khargosh aur uska naya samudri dost saath mein sote hain.
text: [GENTLE] Nano khargosh. Neela paani. [CALM] Shh shh shh. Machli dost. [JOYFUL] Haan haan haan. Saath mein khel. [WHISPERING] Chup chup chup. Garam ret. [SLEEPY] So jao so jao. Meethe sapne.
annotated_text: [GENTLE] Nano khargosh. Neela paani. [CALM] Shh shh shh. Machli dost. [JOYFUL] Haan haan haan. Saath mein khel. [WHISPERING] Chup chup chup. Garam ret. [SLEEPY] So jao so jao. Meethe sapne.
morals: Dosti mein sukh hai
Saath mein sona accha

title: Kira Ka Samudri Ghar Ki Khoj
description: Ek brave chhoti ladki Kira apne island ghar mein family ke saath naye kamre discover karti hai aur cozy sleeping jagah paati hai.
text:
[RHYTHMIC] Kira chhoti brave girl thi, island pe rehti thi
Family ke saath warm ghar mein, khushi se has rahi thi

[PAUSE]

[GENTLE] Mama Papa ke saath, naya room dhundha usne
Bamboo walls aur soft mats, dekha ocean view se

[PAUSE]

[JOYFUL] Grandma ne kaha 'dekho beta', shells aur pearls yahan
Family ka purana treasure, mil gaya hai ghar mein

[PAUSE]

[WHISPERING] Waves ki awaaz sun kar, Kira tired ho gayi
Soft mat pe lie down karke, family ke paas so gayi

[PAUSE]

[CALM] Ocean breeze se lullaby, stars shining bright
Family ka love aur warmth, good night sweet night [SLEEPY]

बैंबू वॉल्स और soft मैट्स, देखा ओशन व्यू से

[PAUSE]

[JOYFUL] ग्रैंडमा ने कहा 'देखो बेटा', शेल्स और पर्ल्स यहां
फैमिली का पुराना ट्रेजर, मिल गया है घर में

[PAUSE]

title: Dosti ki Kahani
description: Ek fantasy realm mein, Nova aur uske doston ne milkar ek mushkil ko hal kiya aur dosti ki sachchai samjhe. Ye kahani dosti, teamwork, aur samajh ki mahatta ko darshati hai.
text: [GENTLE] Ek chhota sa shehar tha, jiska naam Aethoria tha, jahan par logon ke dil mein pyaar aur dosti bhar gayi thi. [CALM] Yahan par Nova, ek 15 saal ka non-binary teen, apne doston ke saath milkar ek anokha safar par nikal padta hai. [EXCITED] Unka pehla mission tha, ek purani mandir ki talash, jahan par ek pracheen khazana chhupa hua tha. [CURIOUS] Nova ke saath the uske dost, Zara, Arjun, aur Lila, jo apne-apne khaas hunar ke saath aaye the. [ADVENTUROUS] Saath milkar, ve sabhi ne mushkil raaston par chal kar mandir tak pahunchne ki koshish ki. [MYSTERIOUS] Lekin, jab ve andar ghuste hain, to unhe ek anokhi chunauti ka samna karna padta hai. [DRAMATIC_PAUSE] Unhe ek pracheen puzzle ko suljhana hota hai, jo keval tabhi suljhega jab ve apne hunar ko ek saath mila kar istemal karenge. [JOYFUL] Nova aur uske dost sabhi ne milkar kaam kiya, aur puzzle ko suljhaya. [SLEEPY] Ab, ve sabhi ghar waapas aane ke liye taiyaar hain, aur ek naye din ki shuruaat ke liye utsuk hain.
annotated_text: [GENTLE] Ek chhota sa shehar tha, jiska naam Aethoria tha, jahan par logon ke dil mein pyaar aur dosti bhar gayi thi. [CALM] Yahan par Nova, ek 15 saal ka non-binary teen, apne doston ke saath milkar ek anokha safar par nikal padta hai. [EXCITED] Unka pehla mission tha, ek purani mandir ki talash, jahan par ek pracheen khazana chhupa hua tha. [CURIOUS] Nova ke saath the uske dost, Zara, Arjun, aur Lila, jo apne-apne khaas hunar ke saath aaye the. [ADVENTUROUS] Saath milkar, ve sabhi ne mushkil raaston par chal kar mandir tak pahunchne ki koshish ki. [MYSTERIOUS] Lekin, jab ve andar ghuste hain, to unhe ek anokhi chunauti ka samna karna padta hai. [DRAMATIC_PAUSE] Unhe ek pracheen puzzle ko suljhana hota hai, jo keval tabhi suljhega jab ve apne hunar ko ek saath mila kar istemal karenge. [JOYFUL] Nova aur uske dost sabhi ne milkar kaam kiya, aur puzzle ko suljhaya. [SLEEPY] Ab, ve sabhi ghar waapas aane ke liye taiyaar hain, aur ek naye din ki shuruaat ke liye utsuk hain.
morals: Dosti ki sachchai
Teamwork ki mahatta
Samajh ki zarurat
annotated_text_devanagari: [GENTLE] एक छोटा सा शहर था, जिसका नाम एथोरिया था, जहां पर लोगों के दिल में प्यार और दोस्ती भर गयी थी. [CALM] यहां पर नोवा, एक १५ साल का नॉन-बाइनरी टीन, अपने दोस्तों के साथ मिलकर एक अनोखा सफर पर निकल पड़ता है. [EXCITED] उनका पहला मिशन था, एक पुरानी मंदिर की तलाश, जहां पर एक प्राचीन खजाना छुपा हुआ था. [CURIOUS] नोवा के साथ थे उसके दोस्त, जारा, अर्जुन, और लीला, जो अपने-अपने खास हुनर के साथ आए थे. [ADVENTUROUS] साथ मिलकर, वे सभी ने मुश्किल रास्तों पर चलकर मंदिर तक पहुंचने की कोशिश की. [MYSTERIOUS] लेकिन, जब वे अंदर घुसते हैं, तो उन्हें एक अनोखी चुनौती का सामना करना पड़ता है. [DRAMATIC_PAUSE] उन्हें एक प्राचीन पज़ल को सुलझाना होता है, जो केवल तब ही सुलझेगा जब वे अपने हुनर को एक साथ मिलाकर इस्तेमाल करेंगे. [JOYFUL] नोवा और उसके दोस्त सभी ने मिलकर काम किया, और पज़ल को सुलझाया. [SLEEPY] अब, वे सभी घर वापस आने के लिए तैयार हैं, और एक नए दिन की शुरुआत के लिए उत्सुक हैं.

title: Riya ki Prakriti Yatra
description: Riya, a brave child, embarks on a quest journey to appreciate nature and understand environmental awareness in the Americas, specifically in the contemporary world of North America.
text:
[RHYTHMIC] Riya ek chhote se jungle mein gayi, [GENTLE] jahaan pedon ke neeche ek sundar taal tha. [CALM] Usne dekha ki taal ke kinare par kayi janwar the, jo paani peene aaye the. [PAUSE] 
[RHYTHMIC] Riya ne socha ki prakriti kitni sundar hai, [JOYFUL] aur humein uski raksha karni chahiye. [WHISPERING] Usne apne aap se vaada kiya ki woh hamesha prakriti ki raksha karegi. [PAUSE] 
[RHYTHMIC] Ab Riya [SLEEPY] sone ja rahi hai, aur woh chahti hai ki tum bhi prakriti ki raksha karo.

title: Naina Ki Baraf Waley School Mein Seal Dost Ki Khoj
description: Brave Naina discovers a magical Arctic school where she learns from friendly seals and makes wonderful new friends.
text:
[RHYTHMIC] [GENTLE] Baraf ke ghar mein ek din, Naina pahunchi school
Jahan seal machliyan padhti, barf ka yeh rule

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [JOYFUL] Suno suno kehti seal, hum sikhayenge tumhe
Baraf par kaise khelna, paani mein kaise rehna

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [CALM] Naina ne sikha diving, seal ke saath khela
Arctic ke jaadui raaz, sabne mil kar dekha

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [WHISPERING] Dost ban gaye sab milkar, baraf mein haskar
Naina ki khushi dekho, seekh gayi nayi kala

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [SLEEPY] Ab Naina sapno mein jaaye, seal dost ke saath
Baraf waley school ki yaadein, leke jaaye saath

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [JOYFUL] सुनो सुनो कहती सील, हम सिखायेंगे तुम्हें
बर्फ पर कैसे खेलना, पानी में कैसे रहना

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [CALM] नैना ने सीखा डाइविंग, सील के साथ खेला
आर्कटिक के जादुई राज़, सबने मिल कर देखा

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [WHISPERING] दोस्त बन गए सब मिलकर, बर्फ में हंसकर
नैना की खुशी देखो, सीख गई नई कला

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [SLEEPY] अब नैना सपनों में जाये, सील दोस्त के साथ
बर्फ वाले स्कूल की यादें, लेके जाये साथ

title: Vaanar Mitra Ka Jaadui Khel Samrajya
description: Ek chhote vaanar ka ek magical playground mein transformation ka safar, jahaan woh seekhta hai ki khel mein discovery ki shakti hai.
text:
[RHYTHMIC] [GENTLE] Ek chhota vaanar tha, Hannu naam ka pyaara
Ek jaadui van mein khelta, sapno ka nazaara

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [JOYFUL] Jhoolon par naachta, rang badal jaate the
Har khel mein kuch naya, sapne sach ho jaate the

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [CALM] Patthar chhoote to titli, paani mein taarey
Hannu ka dil khushi se, bhar gaya sitarey

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [WHISPERING] Khel khel mein seekha, duniya ki yeh baat
Har cheez mein chhupa hai, kuch jaadui raat [SLEEPY]

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [JOYFUL] झूलों पर नाचता, रंग बदल जाते थे
हर खेल में कुछ नया, सपने सच हो जाते थे

हर चीज़ में छुपा है, कुछ जादुई रात [SLEEPY]

title: Kiran Aur Samudar Ke Upar Ke Floating Islands Ki Dosti
description: Bhavishya mein samudar ke upar tairte hue magical islands par rehne wala ek brave ladka Kiran apne robot dost ke saath naye friends banata hai.
text:
[RHYTHMIC] Samudar ke upar, aasman mein high,
Tairte hue islands, crystals ki light.
Kiran naam ka ladka, brave aur sweet,
Robot dost Sparky ke saath, adventures complete.

[PAUSE]

[GENTLE] Floating gardens mein flowers glow karte,
Holographic butterflies dance karte.
Kiran lonely feel karta tha sometimes,
Naye friends ki search mein, climbing heights.

[PAUSE]

[JOYFUL] Ek din milе Luna, mermaid so kind,
Aur Zephyr wind-sprite, pure of mind.
Together they explored crystal caves deep,
Sharing stories, promises to keep.

[PAUSE]

[CALM] Floating bridges of light unhe connect karte,
Different islands, hearts ko reflect karte.
Kiran ne sikha, friendship ka magic true,
Distance doesn't matter, when hearts are blue.

[PAUSE]

[WHISPERING] Starfish lanterns light up the night,
Friends gather 'round, everything's right.
Samudar ki waves, gentle lullaby sing,
Dosti ki warmth, peaceful dreams bring.

[PAUSE]

[SLEEPY] Now Kiran sleeps on his island home,
No more alone, no need to roam.
Sapno mein friends, always near,
Future's bright, nothing to fear.

title: Priya Aur Vidya Devi Ki Jaadui Shiksha Yatra
description: Ek brave bachhi Priya ek mythological gurukul mein jaadui gyan seekhti hai aur apne andar ki shakti discover karti hai.
text:
[RHYTHMIC] [GENTLE] Priya ek chhoti si bachhi thi, brave aur smart
Vidya Devi ke gurukul mein, seekhne gai art

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [JOYFUL] Pahadon ke beech mein tha ye jaadui school
Yahan har bachha banta tha gyan ka jewel

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [CALM] Devi ne kaha, "Beta, tumhare andar hai light
Sabko sikhao, karo sab kuch right"

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [WHISPERING] Priya ne sikhayi dusron ko math aur song
Sabke saath milkar, bani friendship strong

[PAUSE]

[RHYTHMIC] [SLEEPY] Ab wo teacher ban gayi, kind aur wise
Sapno mein bhi sikhati, under starry skies

title: Samudra ki Chhupi Duniya
description: Ek bahadur bachche ki kahani jo samudra ki gahrayi mein jaati hai aur wahaan ke jaadui jeevan ko dekhti hai
text:
[RHYTHMIC] Ek bahadur bachcha tha, jiska naam Aarav tha, [GENTLE] jo samudra ki kinare rehta tha. [PAUSE] 
[RHYTHMIC] Wahaan par usne paani ke neeche ki duniya ko dekha, [CALM] jahaan machhliyaan aur anya jeev rehte the. [PAUSE] 
[RHYTHMIC] Usne dekha ki kaise paani ki gati aur dheere-dheere badalne wali gati [JOYFUL] samudra ki lahron ko banati hai, [WHISPERING] aur kaise yeh sab kuch ek dusre se juda hua hai. [SLEEPY]
annotated_text:
[RHYTHMIC] Ek bahadur bachcha tha, jiska naam Aarav tha, [GENTLE] jo samudra ki kinare rehta tha. [PAUSE] 
[RHYTHMIC] Wahaan par usne paani ke neeche ki duniya ko dekha, [CALM] jahaan machhliyaan aur anya jeev rehte the. [PAUSE] 
[RHYTHMIC] Usne dekha ki kaise paani ki gati aur dheere-dheere badalne wali gati [JOYFUL] samudra ki lahron ko banati hai, [WHISPERING] aur kaise yeh sab kuch ek dusre se juda hua hai. [SLEEPY]
morals: Bahaduri aur curiosty se hum naye cheezein seekh sakte hain
Prakriti ki sundarta aur jaadui duniya ko samajhna
annotated_text_devanagari:
[RHYTHMIC] एक बहादुर बच्चा था, जिसका नाम आरव था, [GENTLE] जो समुद्र की किनारे रहता था. [PAUSE] 
[RHYTHMIC] वहां पर उसने पानी के नीचे की दुनिया को देखा, [CALM] जहां मछलियां और अन्य जीव रहते थे. [PAUSE] 
[RHYTHMIC] उसने देखा कि कैसे पानी की गति और धीरे-धीरे बदलती गति [JOYFUL] समुद्र की लहरों को बनाती है, [WHISPERING] और कैसे यह सब कुछ एक दूसरे से जुड़ा हुआ है. [SLEEPY]

title: Advait aur Uske Doston ki Bhavishya Yatra
description: Ek 10 varsh ka ladka advait apne doston ke saath ek bhavishya yatra par jata hai, jaha unhe nayi cheezein seekhne aur apne doston ke saath masti karne ka mauka milta hai. Is yatra mein ve apne aaspas ke sansar ko samajhne aur apne lakshyon ko praapt karne ke liye kai chunautiyon ka saamna karte hain.
text: [GENTLE] Advait ek chhote se ladakh monastery mein rehta tha, jaha usne apne doston ke saath mil kar kai nayi cheezein seekhi. [CALM] Ek din, unke shikshak ne unhein ek nayi yatra ke liye taiyaar kia, jaha ve bhavishya ke baare mein seekhne jaane wale the. [EXCITED] Advait aur uske doston ne apne bag pack kiye aur yatra ke liye taiyaar ho gaye. [CURIOUS] Ve ek bhavishya shahar mein pahunche, jaha unhe kai aisi cheezein mili jo ve pehle kabhi nahin dekhe the. [ADVENTUROUS] Unhone ek robots ke saath milkar ek maze mein se guzarna seekha, jaha unhe apne lakshyon ko praapt karne ke liye kai chunautiyon ka saamna karna pada. [MYSTERIOUS] Phir ve ek bhavishya ke park mein gaye, jaha unhe kai aisi cheezein mili jo us samay nahin thi. [JOYFUL] Advait aur uske doston ne ek saath khelte hue aur hashte hue kai pal bitaaye. [CALM] Lekin phir, unhe ek samasya ka saamna karna pada, jaha unhe apne doston ke saath milkar ek samadhan nikalna tha. [DRAMATIC_PAUSE] Aur tabhi, advait ne apne doston ke saath milkar ek aisa samadhan nikala jo unhe sabko khushi dila sakta tha. [SLEEPY] Ab advait aur uske doston ko apni yatra ke baare mein sochkar neend aa rahi thi, aur ve apne agle din ki yatra ke liye taiyaar ho rahe the.
annotated_text: [GENTLE] Advait ek chhote se ladakh monastery mein rehta tha, jaha usne apne doston ke saath mil kar kai nayi cheezein seekhi. [CALM] Ek din, unke shikshak ne unhein ek nayi yatra ke liye taiyaar kia, jaha ve bhavishya ke baare mein seekhne jaane wale the. [EXCITED] Advait aur uske doston ne apne bag pack kiye aur yatra ke liye taiyaar ho gaye. [CURIOUS] Ve ek bhavishya shahar mein pahunche, jaha unhe kai aisi cheezein mili jo ve pehle kabhi nahin dekhe the. [ADVENTUROUS] Unhone ek robots ke saath milkar ek maze mein se guzarna seekha, jaha unhe apne lakshyon ko praapt karne ke liye kai chunautiyon ka saamna karna pada. [MYSTERIOUS] Phir ve ek bhavishya ke park mein gaye, jaha unhe kai aisi cheezein mili jo us samay nahin thi. [JOYFUL] Advait aur uske doston ne ek saath khelte hue aur hashte hue kai pal bitaaye. [CALM] Lekin phir, unhe ek samasya ka saamna karna pada, jaha unhe apne doston ke saath milkar ek samadhan nikalna tha. [DRAMATIC_PAUSE] Aur tabhi, advait ne apne doston ke saath milkar ek aisa samadhan nikala jo unhe sabko khushi dila sakta tha. [SLEEPY] Ab advait aur uske doston ko apni yatra ke baare mein sochkar neend aa rahi thi, aur ve apne agle din ki yatra ke liye taiyaar ho rahe the.
morals: साथ मिलकर काम करने से बड़ी समस्याओं का समाधान निकाला जा सकता है
सीखने और अनुभव प्राप्त करने से जीवन में आगे बढ़ने में मदद मिलती है
annotated_text_devanagari: [GENTLE] अद्वैत एक छोटे से लद्दाख मठ में रहता था, जहाँ उसने अपने दोस्तों के साथ मिलकर काई नई चीजें सीखी. [CALM] एक दिन, उनके शिक्षक ने उन्हें एक नई यात्रा के लिए तैयार किया, जहाँ वे भविष्य के बारे में सीखने जाने वाले थे. [EXCITED] अद्वैत और उसके दोस्तों ने अपने बैग पैक किए और यात्रा के लिए तैयार हो गए. [CURIOUS] वे एक भविष्य के शहर में पहुँचे, जहाँ उन्हें काई ऐसी चीजें मिली जो वे पहले कभी नहीं देखे थे. [ADVENTUROUS] उन्होंने एक रोबोट्स के साथ मिलकर एक मेज़ में से गुजरना सीखा, जहाँ उन्हें अपने लक्ष्यों को प्राप्त करने के लिए काई चुनौतियों का सामना करना पड़ा. [MYSTERIOUS] फिर वे एक भविष्य के पार्क में गए, जहाँ उन्हें काई ऐसी चीजें मिली जो उस समय नहीं थी. [JOYFUL] अद्वैत और उसके दोस्तों ने एक साथ खेलते हुए और हँसते हुए काई पल बिताए. [CALM] लेकिन फिर, उन्हें एक समस्या का सामना करना पड़ा, जहाँ उन्हें अपने दोस्तों के साथ मिलकर एक समाधान निकालना था. [DRAMATIC_PAUSE] और तबhi, अद्वैत ने अपने दोस्तों के साथ मिलकर एक ऐसा समाधान निकाला जो उन्हें सबको खुशी दिला सकता था. [SLEEPY] अब अद्वैत और उसके दोस्तों को अपनी यात्रा के बारे में सोचकर नींद आ रही थी, और वे अपने अगले दिन की यात्रा के लिए तैयार हो रहे थे.
